The combination vandetanib fulvestrant address potential interfere multiple interdependent growth-stimulatory pathway simultaneously . Recent work reveal cross-talk epidermal growth factor receptor ( EGFR ) estrogen receptor ( ER ) pathways . This clinical trial evaluate clinical interaction EGFR inhibitor , vandetanib , combination ER down-regulator , fulvestrant .
